work:title.common:title: Conversion from mutualism to parasitism: a mutant of the ectomycorrhizal agaricomycete Tricholoma matsutake that induces stunting, wilting, and root degeneration in seedlings of its symbiotic partner, Pinus densiflora, in vitro
Identification of UDP glucosyltransferases from the aluminum-resistant tree Eucalyptus camaldulensis forming β-glucogallin, the precursor of hydrolyzable tannins
Heavy-ion beam mutagenesis of the ectomycorrhizal agaricomycete Tricholoma matsutake that produces the prized mushroom “matsutake” in conifer forests
Growth and uptake of caesium, rubidium, and potassium by ectomycorrhizal and saprotrophic fungi grown on either ammonium or nitrate as the N source
An aluminum-resistance mechanism in Eucalyptus camaldulensis: complexation between aluminum and oenothein B in presence of organic acids in vitro
Gel-filtration analysis to detect Al-binding ligands in Eucalyptus camaldulensis
Identification of a hydrolyzable tannin, oenothein B, as an aluminum-detoxifying ligand in a highly aluminum-resistant tree, Eucalyptus camaldulensis
Formation of a complex with aluminum by ozone-treated kraft lignins and their low molecular weight fragments
Aluminum distribution and reactive oxygen species accumulation in root tips of two Melaleuca trees differing in aluminum resistance
Role of aluminum-binding ligands in aluminum resistance of Eucalyptus camaldulensis and Melaleuca cajuputi
Aluminum tolerance and aluminum-induced deposition of callose and lignin in the root tips of Melaleuca and Eucalyptus species
Ectomycorrhizal association enhances Al tolerance by inducing citrate secretion in Pinus densiflora
